snippet: Fourth seed and 2014 champion Stan Wawrinka was given a thorough workout before beating 37-year-old Radek Stepanek 6-2 6-3 6-4 to advance to the third round of the Australian Open on Thursday....
lead_paragraph: Fourth seed and 2014 champion Stan Wawrinka was given a thorough workout before beating 37-year-old Radek Stepanek 6-2 6-3 6-4 to advance to the third round of the Australian Open on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Stops Stepanek to Move Into Third Round
headline.main: Wawrinka Stops Stepanek to Move Into Third Round
